description: Akihisa and friends participate in a treasure hunting test. Answering questions correctly will lead to great rewards - but with all the Summoner teams looking for the same prizes, a battle might be tough to avoid!

titles.title: Chizu to Takara to Striker Sigma V
Mapas, Tesouros E Striker Sigma Cinco!
Maps, Treasures, and Striker Sigma V
地図と宝とストライカー・シグマV
